title: AI Gesture Art
subtitle: OpenCV Hackathon
description: An Android app utilizing OpenCV and generative AI to create works of art from hand gestures.

title: Mock Online Bank Website
subtitle: CS 340 Database Project
description: The project started as a database for my CS 340 course. I decided to continue working on it and make it into a full stack web application. The website is a mock online bank website that allows users to create an account, login, and perform basic banking functions. The website is built using Node.js, Express, and MySQL. The website is still a work in progress and I plan to add more features in the future.

title: Parchment by CapturedSun
subtitle: Senior Capstone - Internship
description: Parchment is an innovative application that transforms the filesystem and desktop, seemlessly integrating local and web content. Files, documents, notes, and more are all organized based on content rather than its medium.
